text: Manuel Santos Arboleda Sánchez (born August 2, 1979 in Buenventura, Valle del Cauca) is a retired Colombian football defender. == Achievements == * Recopa Sudamericana 2004 Champion with Cienciano * Polish Cup runner up 2006 with Zagłębie Lubin * Polish Championship in 2006/2007 season with Zagłębie Lubin * Polish Championship in 2009/2010 season with Lech Poznań ==External links== * Manuel Arboleda profile on www.90minut.pl * Article informing about Arboleda being interested in playing for Poland Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:People from Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca Category:Association football defenders Category:Independiente Santa Fe footballers Category:Deportes Tolima footballers Category:Atlético Huila footballers Category:Cienciano footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Peru Category:Zagłębie Lubin players Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Polish footballers
title: Manuel Arboleda
